comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC note: Bain's caption is "Guarding Gold," not FOR gold.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks, Wystan.  As you know, the titles were transcribed from an inventory, not from the negative or scan that you see here.  Without the photo, the transcriber had no way of vetting the info and they did their best.  Variants are the result.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Greg, no criticism intended, but I figured LOC might like an opportunity to make the correction, if it were brought to your attention.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Correct it we shall!  Our records are richer and better with edits and research by Wystan and others.  Thanks to all!
